entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
